backend/main.mo: Actor that fetches and caches GNews API results per region, refreshing data daily and exposing getNews and forceRefreshNews methods.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten summaries of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router with routes for home, news, and coming-soon pages and provides global layout.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsItemRow: Renders a numbered news item with headline and preview text.
frontend/src/components/news/NewsSection: Displays a regionâ€™s news with loading, error, gated, and demo-mode behavior using UI components.
frontend/src/config/newsDataSource.ts: Toggle between demo and backend data sources for news fetching.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches the backend actor, updating when the user's identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook to fetch region news, disabled when demo mode is active.
frontend/src/hooks/useRegionNews.ts: Provides a hook to fetch, parse, cache, and manage region-specific news with demo mode support and Israel verification handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/lib/news/demoNewsData.ts: Contains static demo news items for each region for development or offline use.
frontend/src/lib/news/parseNews.ts: Parses GNews JSON responses into clean news items with basic error handling and text sanitization.
frontend/src/lib/news/regionConfig.ts: Exports the list of supported regions with IDs, names, and flag icons.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React, sets up React Query and identity provider, and renders the main App.
frontend/src/pages/ComingSoonPage.tsx: Renders a placeholder page indicating a feature is under development with navigation back home.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Displays the home screen with navigation cards to news and upcoming features.
frontend/src/pages/NewsPage.tsx: Shows world news sections for all regions with refresh support and demo mode messaging.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config enabling dark mode, custom fonts, colors, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state describing a mobile app with a beginner-friendly home screen, demo News sections, and architectural notes for future API-backed news fetching.
